originalText.text: Our child, Leo, had a great experience with private tutoring for the SHSAT with Tutorverse. He was so excited to get into his first choice - Bronx Science and just started there this September! We started private tutoring with Tutorverse in October for the exam in November and Jeff Wu at Tutorverse helped us maximize the limited time and gave us an amazing tutor. Our tutor Tommy worked with our child to develop strategies in both the Math and ELA sections that helped increase their scores and improve time management and most importantly, manage the stress of the exam. His confidence improved dramatically and he felt very prepared by the time the exam date arrived! Can't thank you enough! We highly recommend Tutorverse!

originalText.text: We had an amazing experience with the Tutorverse. My daughter did group SHSAT classes as well as some private tutoring. Her instructors were great and her score increased significantly from when she started- she got an offer from her top choice specialized high school and she couldn't have done it without them.

text.text: We had an amazing experience with the Tutorverse. My daughter did group SHSAT classes as well as some private tutoring. Her instructors were great and her score increased significantly from when she started- she got an offer from her top choice specialized high school and she couldn't have done it without them.

originalText.text: Tutorverse knows how to prepare students for the SHSAT. We considered getting private 1:1 tutoring, which we have done for other subjects, but Tutorverse is the best at preparing students for this exam. The practice tests give your child a real sense of what the test will be like and builds their confidence for the actual exam day. Having some sessions in the spring and then additional sessions in the fall also helped make the material familiar and I think, in our case resulted in getting the high school of my son's choice.

originalText.text: We had the most amazing tutor help prepare our daughter for the SAT. With three weeks to prepare, her tutor raised her score 100 points! He was patient, extremely knowledgeable and also addresses her text anxiety with breathing techniques. They developed a real bond, and she decided to continue tutoring for a second and final SAT test. We couldn’t be happier- the communication, session recaps and true interest everyone showed toward our daughter and her future was tremendous. Highly recommend and will definitely use them again for our younger daughter.

originalText.text: Both my son and my daughter use their service, for SSAT and SHSAT. We attended classes and use private tutor for ELA and maths as well. I’m very pleased with their exam result. My son got the offer from Bronx Science. The staff is very friendly and answer your questions quickly. The tutor is very responsive, and wrote long summary of each class to keep you in the loop. Highly recommended.
